breast.translation[0].definitions[0].def: one of the two round raised parts on a woman’s chest that produce milk when she has a baby
breast.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: These bras are specially designed for women with large breasts.
breast.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the part of your body between your neck and your stomach
breast.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Dick cradled her photograph against his breast.
breast.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the front part of a bird’s body, below its neck
breast.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a robin with a red breast
breast.translation[0].definitions[3].def: meat that comes from the front part of the body of a bird such as a chicken
breast.translation[0].definitions[4].def: the part of a jacket, shirt etc that covers the top part of your chest
breast.translation[0].definitions[5].def: where your feelings of sadness, love, anger, fear etc come from
breast.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to reach the top of a hill or slope
breast.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to push against something with your chest
